divs: sighting detailswe were having sort of a family reunion type picnic\cookout with a little over a dozen people. we started seeing what looked like satellites moving(satellites resemble moving stars). anyway, we watched them move at ridiculously fast speeds directly above us. some would form into one and then split up into multiple objects. some would disappear and some would return in the same general location of the sky. they looked just like stars you really couldn't make out any shapes or colors. it occurred at night just when it was becoming dark enough out to see the stars. was witnessed by almost everyone at the cookout. was amazing.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Talala
There were no other sightings in Talala on or around July 12th 1996
